thread.title: This Woman's Warning About a Shirt Wrapped Around Her Windshield Wipers Is So Important
thread.title_full: This Woman's Warning About a Shirt Wrapped Around Her Windshield Wipers Is So Important

author: Hilary White
title: This Woman's Warning About a Shirt Wrapped Around Her Windshield Wipers Is So Important
text:
Woman Warns About Shirt Being Tied Around Windshield Wipers This Woman's Warning About a Shirt Wrapped Around Her Windshield Wipers Is So Important February 21, 2017 by Hilary White 2 Shares 
When Ashley Hardacre returned to her car in a parking lot late one night after work at a mall, she found a strange shirt draped over her windshield. Going with her gut, she didn't remove the shirt immediately — which to many would seem like the natural thing to do — but instead got in her car and drove to a safe place before examining the situation more. 
What she found was disturbing. "I used my windshield wipers to try to get them [sic] off but the shirt was completely wrapped around my wiper blade. . . . I don't know why the shirt was on my car but it had to have been intentional the way it was put on there," she said in a viral post she put on Facebook. 
Hardacre, having heard from her parents that some people use tricks to lure women out of their cars and keep them distracted, recognized that what seemed like a random occurrence could actually be a dangerous situation. "There were two cars near me and one was running so I immediately felt uneasy and knew I couldn't get out to get it off," she said on Facebook. ADVERTISEMENT 
Her post has been shared more than 90,000 times and brings to light a scary tactic potentially being used out there. Her story is a good reminder to always be aware of your surroundings, and if you feel unsafe for any reason, always go with your gut and trust your instincts — and get somewhere safer! Related:
